bi: Eel ahyɛ me hyɛn no mu ma
a: My hovercraft is full of eels
what do you do for a living

bi: Yɛn botaeɛ: sɛdeɛ yɛbɛboa ama nnipa a wɔwɔ wiase nyinaa ate wiase ase na wɔatumi adi nkɔmmɔ
a: Our mission: to enable everyone, everywhere to understand the world and express themselves across languages.

bi: Yɛn botaeɛ: sɛ yɛbɛhyehyɛ wiase yi mu nsɛm na yɛama nsa aka na ɛso aba mfasoɔ.
a: Our mission: to organize the world's information and make it universally accessible and useful.

bi: mente deɛ worepɛ akyerɛ no ase
a: I don't understand what you mean

bi: deɛ ɛtwa toɔ a ɛnkyerɛ akumaa
wo ho yɛ fɛ pa ara
deɛn na woreyɛ seesei ara yi
a: what are you doing right now

bi: ɛda no nkɔ yie mma wo
da no nkɔ yie mma wo
wo nso saa ara da no mu
a: many many happy returns of the day

bi: deɛ w'ani ku ho boro so
Meda wo ase sɛ wode yɛn app di dwuma
Yɛda wo ase wɔ w'aboterɛ ho berɛ a yɛrehwehwɛ deɛ ɛwɔ ship no mu no
a: Thank you for your patience while we investigate shipment

bi: na wo da no te sɛn
